posts.title: json-server study
posts.author: typicode
posts.content:
Get a full fake REST API with zero coding in less than 30 seconds (seriously)
Created with <3 for front-end developers who need a quick back-end for prototyping and mocking.
Egghead.io free video tutorial - Creating demo APIs with json-server
JSONPlaceholder - Live running version
See also hotel :hotel:, a process manager for web developers.
